entry.title: About Me
entry.summary: Hello, everyone! I am Winrich and welcome to my blog. I was born in a small city in central China, and I have faced various challenges and difficulties in my family. When I was around six years old, my parents lost their jobs, and then…
entry.content:
Hello, everyone! I am Winrich and welcome to my blog.

My Story

I was born in a small city in central China, and I have faced various challenges and difficulties in my family. When I was around six years old, my parents lost their jobs, and then my father suffered a stroke, resulting in partial paralysis. Growing up in such an environment, I felt a sense of unease and confusion about life.

My childhood memories have become quite blurry, but I still vividly remember a moment in the fourth grade when I was punished by the teacher for being late and mocked by my classmates. It was during that time that I learned to hide my anxiety and put on a carefree facade. However, the teacher’s words - “Shake your leg in front of your disabled father” - left me disheartened and made me lose my gratitude towards the world.

During my adolescence, I went through a period of waywardness, skipping classes, and even attempting dangerous activities. After experiencing a series of setbacks, I developed an interest in computers and started learning web design and programming languages.

Investment and Trading

In 2007, I began to explore the world of futures trading, and through trial and error, I gradually understood the complexities of investment and trading. However, the initial experiences were full of failures and losses, leading me to realize that investing is not a mere game but an art that requires serious study and careful planning.

After a series of ups and downs, I grew into an investor and developed my own “Cycle Trading Rules.” During a period of introspection and contemplation, my understanding of trading and my mentality underwent a qualitative transformation.

About This Blog

This blog serves as a record of my investment and trading journey and also as a platform to share my experiences and insights with readers. Through sharing my stories and insights, I hope to motivate more people to embark on the path of investment and become better traders.

The domain name of this blog is “imwin.org,” which symbolizes “I’m a winner,” and serves as a proud declaration of my trading journey. Through this blog, I hope to connect with readers, engage in discussions about the world of investment, and grow and progress together.

About “Winrich”

“Winrich” is the English name I have chosen for myself. “Win” represents victory and success, while “rich” symbolizes wealth and abundance. For me, this name is not only a personal aspiration but also a constant reminder to maintain a positive mindset and focused spirit in my trading endeavors.

Contact Me

If you are interested in my stories and trading experiences or have any questions and suggestions, feel free to reach out to me. You can contact me via email at your.email@example.com or find me on social media. Looking forward to connecting with you!

Thank you for visiting my blog, and I hope you find valuable information and inspiration here!

entry.title: Winrich: The Journey from Ups and Downs to a Winner in Cyclical Trading
entry.summary: Hello everyone, I am Winrich. In this BLOG, I will share my growth journey, investment experience, and the new phase of cyclical trading. It is a story about challenges, struggles, and growth, hoping to inspire and enlighten everyone. I started to explore futures trading in…
entry.content:
Hello everyone, I am Winrich. In this BLOG, I will share my growth journey, investment experience, and the new phase of cyclical trading. It is a story about challenges, struggles, and growth, hoping to inspire and enlighten everyone.

I started to explore futures trading in 2007. At that time, I knew nothing about investing and only had a basic understanding of the futures market. However, my curiosity and passion drove me to continue exploring, hoping to find a suitable trading approach for myself.

After years of trial and error, I arrived at October 2020, attempting to engage in trading. Due to the lack of systematic trading methods and plans, I suffered heavy losses. This experience made me realize that investment is not a simple game but an art that requires serious learning and meticulous planning.

In July 2021, I decided to enter the stage of technical advancement. I delved into the study and research of futures trading techniques, constantly trying different trading methods and strategies, learning from experience and lessons. No longer blindly following the crowd, I began to form my own trading philosophy and gradually found a suitable trading approach.

With the arrival of 2022, I experienced a psychological transformation. I learned to control emotions and mentality, becoming more composed in the face of trading fluctuations and pressures. This change in mindset not only led to better performance in trading but also made me more confident and resolute in life.

However, the above content is not the entirety of my story. In July 2023, I set foot on the trading path once again. I decided to record this new trading journey on my blog, sharing with readers every trade, every thought, and every insight. I will delve into my Cyclical Trading Principles and share the challenges and gains in trading with everyone.

This is a brand-new phase, and I know that the trading journey may still encounter setbacks and challenges. Nevertheless, I will face everything with a positive attitude. I believe that through recording and sharing my trading journey, I can become a better investor and a true winner.

Thank you for reading my BLOG! Looking forward to witnessing together, let us continuously progress and surpass on the path of investment!

entry.title: Windows 10 Free Activation
entry.summary: By command prompt Step 1: Click on the start button, search for “cmd” then Open Command Prompt (cmd) as administrator. The following is the list of Windows 10 Volume license keys. Home: TX9XD-98N7V-6WMQ6-BX7FG-H8Q99 Home N: 3KHY7-WNT83-DGQKR-F7HPR-844BM Home Single Language: 7HNRX-D7KGG-3K4RQ-4WPJ4-YTDFH Home Country Specific: PVMJN-6DFY6–9CCP6–7BKTT-D3WVR Professional:…
entry.content:
By command prompt

Step 1: Click on the start button, search for “cmd” then Open Command Prompt (cmd) as administrator.

The following is the list of Windows 10 Volume license keys.

Home: TX9XD-98N7V-6WMQ6-BX7FG-H8Q99
Home N: 3KHY7-WNT83-DGQKR-F7HPR-844BM
Home Single Language: 7HNRX-D7KGG-3K4RQ-4WPJ4-YTDFH
Home Country Specific: PVMJN-6DFY6–9CCP6–7BKTT-D3WVR
Professional: W269N-WFGWX-YVC9B-4J6C9-T83GX
Professional N: MH37W-N47XK-V7XM9-C7227-GCQG9
Education: NW6C2-QMPVW-D7KKK-3GKT6-VCFB2
Education N: 2WH4N-8QGBV-H22JP-CT43Q-MDWWJ
Enterprise: NPPR9-FWDCX-D2C8J-H872K-2YT43
Enterprise N: DPH2V-TTNVB-4X9Q3-TJR4H-KHJW4

Step 2: Install KMS client key

Type this command (note: replace yourlicensekey according to your windows edition license key given above.)

slmgr /ipk yourlicensekey

Set KMS machine address

Use the command “slmgr /skms kms8.msguides.com” to connect to my KMS server.

Activate your Windows

The last step is to activate your Windows using the command “slmgr /ato”.

Now check the activation status again.


Windows 10 is activated successfully.
